replies.body:
{{champion:53}} **Blitzcrank file #3, this is proving to be one of my most difficult challenges. Today I consider Jinx. 
**
{{champion:59}} I can’t believe you have a driver license.

{{champion:222}} I may be a crazy psychopath, but I am not stupid. 

{{champion:59}} Fair point, may I ask where we are going?

{{champion:222}} We are going to a demolition derby tonight. 

{{champion:59}} That sounds just like you. Hope you got good seats

{{champion:222}} Seats?

{{champion:59}} You did get tickets right?

{{champion:222}} Tickets? We aren’t going to watch the derby, we are going to be IN it. 

{{champion:59}} Oh no….

*30 minutes later*

{{champion:119}} Ladies and Gentlemen that are not me, Draven, I must say that this has been an amazing show. I have not seen so much destruction since the last time I held one of my executions shows. I give this demolition derby 2 Draven.

{{champion:59}} DEAR GOD SOMEONE HELP ME!!!!!!

*Up in the stand*

{{champion:102}} *munches on popcorn* I guess I should go save him..oh is that a dragon made out of cars!? I got to watch this first.

{{champion:59}} Why isn't anyone stopping this!!!?

{{champion:68}} check this bad-boy out, Jinx

{{champion:222}} nice

{{champion:68}} yeah, she's got everything. seat warmers, two-way radio, growable tir-

{{champion:222}} ah, feels great

{{champion:68}} hey, get out of my car.

{{champion:59}} no! stay in the car

{{champion:222}} lets see what this baby can do! common J! 

{{champion:59}} & {{champion:68}} AHHHHHH!!!

ah, the "common J"
Non-royal Jarvan IV confirmed

{{champion:222}}  "hey! Can we go blow up your castle!?"
{{champion:59}} "There's- um, nothing left to destroy..."
{{champion:222}} ?
*Meanwhile, at Jarvan IV's house*
{{champion:36}} "MUNDO'S TURN FO KARAOKE!"
{{champion:27}} "Would you like a drink?"
{{champion:64}} "Where's the exit?"
{{champion:34}} "Anyone want a Popsicle?"
~
{{champion:222}} "WHY WAS I NOT INVITED!?"

**In the stands**

{{champion:84}} *is gazing at the dragon made of cars.* "Now that's something you don't see everyday."
{{champion:102}} "Whoa, where did you come from?"
{{champion:84}} "I've been here the entire time."
{{champion:102}} "...right. Didn't we leave you at the party?"
{{champion:84}} "About that..."

**Jarvan's [Former] Castle**

{{champion:63}} *is singing* "It's getting hot in here..."
